body.script: window.setTimeout(function () { document.title = "Home - Lincoln R2 School District"; }, 500);

div.p: The Mission of the Benton County R-II School District is to provide positive educational opportunities to promote individual development and opportunities for success in a safe, orderly, and caring environment.

1.Â All students are capable of learning. Â
2.Â Each student is a unique individual worthy of consideration on his/her own merits. Â
3.Â An environment conducive to learning and the promotion of self-worth in students must be created.
4.Â Education is a life-long process and the school must assist and promote programs to benefit the entire community. Â
5.Â The educational program must provide for systematic review and evaluation and possess flexibility to meet changing needs. Â
6.Â The educational programs of the district are a joint effort requiring involvement of the home and community with the school. Â
7.Â The allocation of time and resources must be flexible in order to provide for individual needs and to capitalize on individual strengths.

div.a: Screening Clinic Provided by the Shriners Hospitals

br.p: This clinic has been postponed due to the COVID-19 outbreak. We will let you know when it will be rescheduled.
